resources.string: Welcome to Guanzon Circle! Please note that during the first launch, the app may take slightly longer to load as it initializes and prepares necessary data. We appreciate your patience and assure you subsequent launches will be faster.\n Thank you for understanding!
Exporting your database is only allowed if problem occurs and if supervise by MIS
Download new records of data from server.
Check your for new system updates.
Use by developers and implementors for testing phase. Only MIS-SEG are able to use this mode.
Clearing app data will erase all, records, pending loan applications, pending dcp remittance and selfie login data. Please make sure all data has been uploaded to server.
